tool_description:
The minify API allows you to easily compress your CSS, HTML, and Javascript code with a single API call.

Minify is ideal for web developers building static sites, who want to cache the smallest possible version of their assets in order to speed up delivery to end users. Plug this API into your build tools, or your production web servers to speed up your site.
name: Minify
title: Minify

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rdegges-minify-v1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rdegges-minify-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
